attributes.action: Better hours for singles parents in the NHS.
attributes.background: I got a job in a hospital which I'm enjoying, my big problem is the unavailable  hours, as a single mom.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by better hours. Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Individual employment issues would be a matter for local NHS managers, rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole. You could raise your issue with a manager.

You could ask your MP to take up your case. You can find out who your MP is, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
